sentence.Network_en: He hated whites from the age of six, when they cold-bloodedly murdered his father.
sentence.Network_cn: 他6岁时父亲被白人残忍地杀害，那时起他就开始憎恨白人。

sentence.Network_en: He cold - bloodedly planned the murder of his boss.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很冷血地谋划杀害自己的老板.

sentence.Network_en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

PerfectNetExp.abs: he cold-bloodedly planned the murder of his boss .他冷酷地策划谋杀他的老板。

entry.def: Someone who is cold-blooded does not show any pity or emotion.

example.ex: This was a brutal and cold-blooded killing.
example.tran: 这是一场残忍无情的杀戮。

entry.def: Cold-blooded animals have a body temperature that changes according to the surrounding temperature. Reptiles, for example, are cold-blooded.

sentences.sentence: "he cold-bloodedly planned the murder of his boss"
